details.name: Check In
details.description: Selected participants can check in to their respective hotels. Detailed hotel information will be provided prior to the event.

details.name: Lunch
details.description: Lunch break for selected participants. Lunch will be provided at the event venue.

details.name: Info Session
details.description: Informative session to provide selected participants with essential details, guidelines, and expectations for the Hackathon.

events.name: Coffee Break
events.description: Participants can enjoy a coffee break and network with other attendees. Refreshments will be provided during the break.

details.name: Networking Dinner
details.description: Hackathon participants can network with fellow participants and mentors during a dinner event.

details.name: Team Building Activity
details.description: Team building activity for Hackathon participants.

details.name: Hackathon Start
details.description: Official start of the Hackathon.

details.name: Participants Start Working
details.description: Participants start working on their Hackathon projects.

details.name: Departure To Hackathon Location
details.description: Participants depart from the hotel to the Hackathon location.

details.name: Participants Start Working
details.description: Participants collaborate with their teams and work on their projects. Necessary resources and support will be provided.

details.name: Participants Lunch
details.description: Selected participants can enjoy a provided lunch to refuel and recharge for the remaining Hackathon activities.

events.name: Coffee Break
events.description: Participants can take a coffee break, network, and enjoy refreshments provided during the break.

details.name: Networking Dinner
details.description: Networking dinner for Hackathon participants and mentors.

details.name: Return To Hotel
details.description: Participants return to the hotel.

details.name: Participants Start Working
details.description: Participants continue working on their Hackathon projects.

details.name: Departure To Hackathon Location
details.description: Participants depart from the hotel to the Hackathon location.

details.name: Finalize Projects
details.description: Teams focus on finalizing their Hackathon projects and preparing for the presentation.

details.name: Participants Pitch Presentation
details.description: Participants will present and pitch their projects to a panel of judges and the audience.

details.name: Participants Pitch
details.description: Finalists will pitch their projects to a larger audience, including industry experts and potential investors.

details.name: Participants Lunch
details.description: Selected participants can enjoy a provided lunch to refresh and recharge before the final phase of the event.

details.name: Evaluation
details.description: Judges will evaluate the projects and provide feedback.

details.name: Winner Announcement
details.description: The winners of the Hackathon will be announced, recognizing their exceptional contributions and achievements.
